ItemDesc: Upon use, increases Max HP of all allies by <unbreak>12%</unbreak> for the next battle.
ItemBGDesc: The steel skewer has all sorts of Belobog delicacies on it, and is barbecued thoroughly using high heat. Its ingredients are mostly harmless. It is also the favorite food of Belobog's adventurers out in the wild, as well as being the most easily obtainable. "This tastes so good! What kinds of meat are in it, though?" "You wouldn't want to know."
